docs.lead_paragraph: Soros Fund Management, one of the hedge fund industry's most closely watched investors, exited J.C. Penney and trimmed its stake in Herbalife late last year, marking a notable shift in course only months after buying into the companies.

docs.lead_paragraph: California would become the first state to require warning labels on sodas and other sugary drinks under a proposal a state lawmaker announced Thursday.

headline.main: California Bill Seeks Warnings on Sugary Drinks
headline.print_headline: California Bill Seeks Warnings on Sugary Drinks

docs.snippet: California would become the first state to require warning labels on sodas and other sugary drinks under a proposal a state lawmaker announced Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: All sodas and other sugar-sweetened drinks sold in California would be required to carry warning labels for obesity, diabetes and tooth decay under a bill introduced in Sacramento on Thursday, backed by several public health advocacy groups.

headline.main: California Lawmaker Proposes Warning Labels for Sugary Drinks
headline.print_headline: California Lawmaker Proposes Warning Labels for Sugary Drinks

docs.snippet: All sodas and other sugar-sweetened drinks sold in California would be required to carry warning labels for obesity, diabetes and tooth decay under a bill introduced in Sacramento on Thursday, backed by several public health advocacy groups.
